content: the dutton beanie is a stylish unisex crochet hat featuring the alpine stitch for a rich textured look made with lightweight fingering yarn this intermediate-level pattern is perfect for anyone looking to add a cozy versatile beanie to their fall or winter wardrobe this pattern is available to view for free on my blog or you can upgrade to the ad-free printable pdf here on ravelry **what s included ** 6 page printable pdf download written instructions for 4 sizes toddler child teen/small adult and adult links to video stitch tutorial and pattern tutorial **pattern difficulty ** intermediate **construction ** hat is worked from the bottom up starting with a fold over brim **sizing & yardage ** head circumference yardage toddler 18-20 270 yards child 20-21 285 yards teen/small adult 21-22 317 yards adult 22-23 333 yards **yarn ** stroll tweed fingering #1 65% superwash merino wool 25% nylon 10% donegal tweed 50g/231 yards all of my patterns are thoroughly tested and/or tech edited all of my patterns are in us terms due to the nature of the pdf files sales i will not refund any patterns however i am always available via email or a message here on ravelry if you have any questions about the patterns you may sell what you produce from my patterns but the pattern itself is copyrighted and may not be shared or changed in part or in whole my photos are also copyrighted and may never be used to sell the products you make ** love this pattern stay up to date on all things two brothers blankets including new patterns releases and fun events by subscribing to my newsletter 1 ** 1 https //www twobrothersblankets com/subscribe/
